author: pburba
msg: Test that switched children of merge target get merge info from repository.
(merge_to_path_with_switched_children): Tweak test so one of the merge
targets switched children has inheritable mergeinfo from the repos in
addition to that resulting from the merge.

author: aogier
msg: Fix a log message (it was in a wrong order)
Now supporting the "replaced" and "normal" status of files

author: hwright
msg: Add and set the merge_sensitive member of the option state struct.  Followup
(main): Set the merge_sensitive flag if the option is given.

author: hwright
msg: Fix part of issue 1776:  Allow 'svn mkdir' to make intermediate
(svn_cl__mkdir): Pass the make_parents flag to the client library.
(svn_cl__cmd_table): Accept the make-parents flag for 'svn mkdir'.
(mkdir_urls): Take the make parents flag, and if true, add any lacking
parents to the list of targets.
(svn_client_mkdir3): New function.  In the local case, instead of creating
the directories directly, use a recursive helper function.
